item.title: Watch: How the world is celebrating the arrival of 2025
item.description: The UK followed other European countries with spectacular firework displays, after New Zealand and Australia were the first to celebrate.

item.title: Watch: How the world is celebrating the arrival of 2025
item.description: The UK followed other European countries with spectacular firework displays, after New Zealand and Australia were the first to celebrate.

item.title: The struggle to reunite children with families in war-torn Gaza
item.description: An estimated 17,000 children are unaccompanied or separated from family who would ordinarily care for them.

item.title: Data extracted from first Jeju Air black box - ministry
item.description: Investigators hope the data will provide insights about the crucial moments leading up to the tragedy.

item.title: Ukraine ends transit of Russian gas to EU
item.description: Russia is still be able to pipe gas to Hungary, as well as Turkey and Serbia, through the Black Sea.
